subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The right-hander Mike Pelfrey, a 2005 draft choice the Mets had wanted to turn into an ace, signed a one-year deal Monday with the Minnesota Twins, after having Tommy John surgery in May.
snippet: The right-hander Mike Pelfrey, a 2005 draft choice the Mets had wanted to turn into an ace, signed a one-year deal Monday with the Minnesota Twins, after having Tommy John surgery in May.
